alert.note: Alert for Lumpkin; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lumpkin and southwestern White Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Turners Corner, or 8 miles west of Cleveland. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Camp Coleman Lake, Garland, Smithgall Woods Conservation Are, Porter Springs, Turners Corner and Qualatchee Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
